pages.text: Shetland Sheepdogs were originally bred for work on farms, including herding livestock.$(br2)Standing at just over half a block tall, these swift dogs come in six different coats.
These dogs are found most commonly in windswept hills. They can also be found in plains and meadows, and more rarely in savannas.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Mutton Treat.
